column4: hi everyone.  We've got a server that is off in wonderland doing an fsck on a terrabyte drive on boot.  Is it possible to skip that once its started?
it's been 210 since the last one apparently, and it's being very picky about running it
I can do that on my laptop.. pressing a key doesn't do it? pressing escape?
pressing escape just outputs an escape character on the screen
we're using a KVM over IP
it's using an older version of ubuntu?
